rundown: 1-8 L @ Texas Rangers Dylan Dodd: 3.0 innings, 0 earned runs, 2 hits, 0 HR, 4 strikeouts Batters: Sean Murphy (1 hits - 3 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) Michael Harris II (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) The Braves suffered a tough loss against the Texas Rangers, managing only one run while allowing eight. Despite a solid performance from Dylan Dodd, who pitched three scoreless innings, the bullpen struggled to contain the Rangers' offense. Key highlights include: 1. Dylan Dodd's impressive strikeout total of four in just three innings. 2. Michael Harris II's two hits, showcasing his ability to get on base. 3.
